room_title: Escape room "The Office of Secret Agent 22" by Southern Escape Room in Monroe (LA)
room_description:
It is up to you and your special ops team to solve the case of missing agent 22. He has gone into hiding to protect convicting evidence that The Boss is laundering illegal goods into the country, but he left some clues behind in his office to his whereabouts. Find him and convict The Boss. Otherwise, you may not make it out of agent 22â€™s office in time.
There are two identical rooms available at the location, both for 2-8 players. You can book them and compete against your friends to see who escapes first.
